Name: Tate Press
Summary: Bench press exercise performed on a Smith machine.
Reasoning: Targets the triceps, emphasizes the lockout phase.

Name: Back Flyes - With Bands
Summary: Shoulder exercise involving lateral raises while seated.
Reasoning: Targets the upper back, bands add resistance.

Name: Ab Crunch Machine
Summary: Rear deltoid exercise performed lying down with dumbbells.
Reasoning: Isolates the abs, machine adds stability and resistance.

Name: Alternating heel-touch
Summary: Bicep curl performed on a preacher bench with dumbbells.
Reasoning: Simple core exercise, good for targeting obliques.

Name: Wall ball toss
Summary: Combination of a front raise and pullover with weights.
Reasoning: Improves explosive power and coordination.

Name: Smith Machine Incline Bench Press
Summary: Plyometric box jump performed while seated with dumbbells.
Reasoning: Targets the upper chest, Smith machine adds stability.

Name: Machine Shoulder (Military) Press
Summary: Shrug exercise targeting the middle back muscles.
Reasoning: Targets the shoulders, machine provides consistent resistance.

Name: Fire Hydrant
Summary: Front raise exercise for the shoulders performed incline and face-down.
Reasoning: Targets the glutes, mimics a fire hydrant movement.

Name: Cuban press
Summary: Abdominal exercise focusing on lifting the hips.
Reasoning: Combines shoulder and arm movements, requires coordination.

Name: Reverse Flyes With External Rotation
Summary: Lower back exercise using resistance bands, mimicking a good morning.
Reasoning: Targets the rear deltoids, added rotation increases difficulty.

Name: Hanging wind sprint
Summary: Reverse lunge exercise performed using bodyweight.
Reasoning: Challenges core and upper body strength, mimics sprinting motion.

Name: Windmills
Summary: Wrist curl focusing on the forearm extensors, seated with one arm.
Reasoning: Improves core strength and flexibility, requires coordination.

Name: Bent-arm barbell pull-over
Summary: Glute-focused exercise involving a kicking back motion.
Reasoning: Targets the chest and lats, emphasizes the pull-over motion.

Name: Sphinx push-up
Summary: Cardiovascular exercise performed by jogging on a treadmill.
Reasoning: Strengthens triceps and core, Sphinx position adds difficulty.

Name: Smith Machine Close-Grip Bench Press
Summary: Grip strength exercise involving holding and pinching weight plates.
Reasoning: Targets the triceps and chest, close grip focuses on triceps.

Name: Palms-out incline biceps curl
Summary: Rowing exercise with a reverse grip, targeting the upper back.
Reasoning: Targets the biceps, incline position and palm-out grip add variation.

Name: Alternating Cable Shoulder Press
Summary: Speed and acceleration drill performed against a wall.
Reasoning: Targets the shoulders, alternating arms add challenge.

Name: Rocket Jump
Summary: Bench press with a reverse grip, targeting the lower chest.
Reasoning: Develops leg power, requires explosive strength.

Name: Yoke Walk
Summary: Decline chest press performed on a leverage machine.
Reasoning: Tests full-body strength and endurance, requires balance.

Name: Romanian Deadlift with Kettlebell
Summary: Tricep extension using chain handles for added difficulty.
Reasoning: Focuses on hamstrings, kettlebell adds intensity.

Name: Smith machine leg press
Summary: Bench press variation using chains for resistance.
Reasoning: Targets the legs, Smith machine provides stability.

Name: Jefferson Squats
Summary: Core exercise combining a roll-out with a barbell on a bench.
Reasoning: Challenges leg strength and flexibility, unique stance.

Name: Single-arm low cable triceps extension
Summary: Push-up variation combining an incline push-up with a depth jump.
Reasoning: Targets the triceps, single-arm focus increases difficulty.

Name: Smith machine straight-legged hip raise
Summary: Wide grip push-up, focusing on the chest and shoulders.
Reasoning: Strengthens glutes, Smith machine adds stability.

Name: Reverse Hyperextension
Summary: Back extension performed on an exercise ball with added weight.
Reasoning: Strengthens lower back, focuses on hyperextension.
